meanings.definition: The state of being exclusive or limited to a specific group or individual.
meanings.sent1: The exclusivity of the VIP section made everyone feel special.
meanings.sent2: The exclusivity of the club membership ensured privacy for its members.
meanings.sent3: The exclusivity of the secret club made outsiders curious.
meanings.sent4: The exclusivity of the event was like a hidden treasure waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The exclusivity of the boutique made shopping there a luxurious experience.

meanings.definition: The quality of being unique or not shared with others.
meanings.sent1: The exclusivity of her talent set her apart from the rest.
meanings.sent2: The exclusivity of the limited edition item made it highly sought after.
meanings.sent3: The exclusivity of the recipe made it a family heirloom.
meanings.sent4: The exclusivity of the view from the top of the mountain was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The exclusivity of the artist's work made it instantly recognizable.
